name: Gentlemen's Game
description:
Money and betting. Play cards to calming sound of a jazz music in A Gentlemen's Game, where you challenge randomly generated opponents in a card game called Cheat. In Cheat, you can't trust anyone because you don't know whose lying about what cards they are putting down.

   How to play?

    Choose a card from your hand which is  either the same, one above or one below the card on top of the deck, but if you can't play anything, you have to lie and play any card,  but if the opponent discovers you lose!

Credits  

    This game was made in GameMaker Studio by Rooksword (Programmer) and Gutagi (Artist), in the BenBonk 3 day game jam, with the theme "Trust no One". Music by Unheard Music Concepts.
